text: Tried the La Paz Batchoy and it's as close as it gets to authentic La Paz Batchoy!! The lumpia was also really good. Not too greasy and the fried rice and adobe were quite good also. Gonna come back next time!
I tried theirfresh lumpia and it was good! The taste was the one I expected it to be.. Close to Goldilocks Fresh lumpia! 3 for $10 is not bad at all.
Food is so gooood! I loved the La Paz Batchoy. Reminded me of my childhood. It's a typical Filipino Restaurant. I loved the food and service is fast. Will definitely come back.
